entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
